    │   ├── NON-RULE:CLEAR-CURRENT-SCREEN
    │   ├── NON-RULE:PROCESS-ENTER-KEY
    │   ├── NON-RULE:RECEIVE-USRUPD-SCREEN
    │   ├── NON-RULE:SEND-USRUPD-SCREEN
    │   ├── RULE:RETURN-TO-PREV-SCREEN
    │   └── RULE:UPDATE-USER-INFO
    ├── RULE:READ-USER-SEC-FILE
    │   └── NON-RULE:SEND-USRUPD-SCREEN
    ├── RULE:RETURN-TO-PREV-SCREEN
    ├── RULE:UPDATE-USER-INFO
    │   ├── NON-RULE:SEND-USRUPD-SCREEN
    │   ├── RULE:READ-USER-SEC-FILE
    │   └── RULE:UPDATE-USER-SEC-FILE
    └── RULE:UPDATE-USER-SEC-FILE
        └── NON-RULE:SEND-USRUPD-SCREEN

APP:CARDDEMO
└── PGM:COUSR03C
    ├── NON-RULE:CLEAR-CURRENT-SCREEN

    │   └── RULE:SEND-USRDEL-SCREEN

    │   ├── RULE:DELETE-USER-SEC-FILE
